    def login_erp_user(baseurl, username, password):
        """
        登录用户
        :param username: 用户名
        :param password: 密码
        :return: 自定义的关键字返回结果 result
        """
        url = baseurl + "/erp-auth/auth/loginpassword"
        print(url)
        result = ResultBase()
        payload = {
            "account": username,
            "password": password
        }
        header = {
            "Content-Type": "application/json"
        }
        res = baseapi.all_send_requests(method="post", url=url, json=payload, headers=header)
        result.success = False
        if res["result"]["code"] == 200:
            result.success = True
            result.token = res["data"]["token"]
        else:
            result.error = "接口返回码是 【 {} 】, 返回信息：{} ".format(res["result"]["code"], res["result"]["message"])
        result.msg = res["result"]["message"]
        result.response = res
